text: 59|11|wiseonhaneun jadeul-eul geudaeneun boji anh-assdeonga? geudeul-i geudeul-ui hyeongjein bulsinhaneun seongseoui salamdeul-ege malhagil “man-yag geudaedeul-i chubangdoendamyeon ulineun jinsillo geudaedeulgwa hamkke nagal geos-imyeo ulineun geudaedeul-eul wihae geu nugudo jeoldaelo ttaleuji anh-eul geos-io. geuligo man-yag nugungaga geudaedeul-eul gong-gyeoghae ondamyeon ulineun jinsillo geudaedeul-eul doul geos-io” hananimkkeseoneun geudeul-i sillo geojismalhaneun jadeul-im-eul jeung-eonhasinola
